name: Cheenadi Oil
description: Made with rare ingredients used in ancient Arabic and Chinese medcinal recipies. Cheenadi Oil has been in the market over 3 decades to enhance the efficiency of the human body. This 100% organic oil treats rheumatsim, strenghens muscles, cures back pains, heals sprains, strengthens hair follicles, and is used as a massage and wellness oil for the skin. *Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
